text: How long do people usually wait before downloading and switching to the new Julia version? :-)

elements.text: How long do people usually wait before downloading and switching to the new Julia version? :-)

text: Some of us have been on the release candidates for a while, come join us ! :smile:

elements.text: Some of us have been on the release candidates for a while, come join us !

text: usually a week or two but I've had success with previous releases not waiting. 1,6 is kind of a big one though so I am going to resist the urge for at least a few days

elements.text: usually a week or two but I've had success with previous releases not waiting. 1,6 is kind of a big one though so I am going to resist the urge for at least a few days

text: I wish I could join the RC world, but dang I work in prod and am not allowed to do OSS contributions or even report errors at work without formal permission

elements.text: I wish I could join the RC world, but dang I work in prod and am not allowed to do OSS contributions or even report errors at work without formal permission

text: <@UTRAUNYDA> note that you don't need to switch. You can try the new one while still using the old

elements.text: note that you don't need to switch. You can try the new one while still using the old

text: for me: about 0 seconds to switch
